title: 1000th win
body: Currently I am sitting on 999 normal wins and was just wondering if there would be a friendly Rioter that would be willing to play the 1000th win with me :)

replies.body: Just sent you a friend request!
I guess I'll just be forever alone :(

'Sephyre' one of the OCE riot members has offered a fair few Summoners to add her in their quest for the 1000th win.

P.S. Good Job on the 1000th wins when you get it.
P.P.S I'm not guaranteeing that 'Sephyre' will play the '1000th' win game I was just offering with my assistance
Ok, thanks for the positive thoughts and assistance :D
You're in! Sephyre bae to the rescue
I think there is a Riot member that use to do whether that member does or doesn't in another thing.
